column4: "Aber bɛn na ebɛka iyinom ekodu? Na aber bɛn na w’anomu nsɛm bɛyɛ dɛ mframa dzendzen ekodu?"

column2: "Ana Nyankopɔn kyeakyea atsɛmbu? Anaa Otumfo no bɛkyea pɛrpɛr."
"Sɛ wo mba ayɛ bɔn etsia no
column3: Na oegyaa hɔn ahyɛ hɔn mbrato nsamu a:"

column2: "Sɛ ɔwoara hwehwɛ Nyankopɔn ekyir kwan enyiberdo
column3: Na edze wo ntotɔserɛ kyerɛ Otumfo no;"

column2: "Na sɛ wo ho tsew na etsen a; Ampa nkyɛ afei onkekenyan noho ama wo
column3: Na ɔama wo tsenenee tsenabew ayɛ prɔmprɔm anaa?"

column2: "Na kaansa w’ahyɛse yɛ kakraba mpo a

column4: Na ma w’enyi mbra dza hɔn egyanom ahwehwɛ mu ehu no do:"

column5: Osiandɛ hɛn nda tse dɛ nwinwin wɔ asaase do:)"

column4: Na woeyiyi nsɛm efi hɔn akoma mu?"

column2: "Ana ntɔn begyina mbrɛ atɛkyɛ nnyi? Ana atsen begyina mbrɛ nsu nnyi?"
"Mber a ɔda ho wɔ no frɔmfrɔmyɛ mu a wonntwae nnkyenee no mpo
"Mbrɛ hɔn a hɔn werɛ fir Nyankopɔn nyinara hɔn akwan tse nye no; Na nyaatwomnyi n’enyidado bɛhera:"

column3: Na n’awerɛhyɛmu tse dɛ ananse ntentan."
Na n’abaw toto kata no ture do."

column2: "Sɛ wɔsɛɛ no wɔ ne tsenabew a

column4: Na asaase no mu na fofor fi befifir."

column3: Nyankopɔn ronntow nyimpa a odzi mu nnkyen
column4: Nkyii so orunnsuo ebusuyɛfo no mu nngyina."

column3: Na ɔdze osebɔ ahyɛ w’anofamfa mu."

column2: "Hɔn a wokyir wo bofura enyito; Na nyimpa bɔn atsenae ronnko hɔ bio."
